scripts.gen-sepolia: mustache config/sepolia.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/sepolia.json utils/hardcoded.template.ts > utils/hardcoded.ts && yarn gen
scripts.gen-gnosis: mustache config/gnosis.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/gnosis.json utils/hardcoded.template.ts > utils/hardcoded.ts && yarn gen
scripts.gen-chiado-goldsky: mustache config/chiado-goldsky.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/chiado-goldsky.json utils/hardcoded.template.ts > utils/hardcoded.ts && yarn gen
scripts.gen-chiado: mustache config/chiado.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/chiado.json utils/hardcoded.template.ts > utils/hardcoded.ts && yarn gen
scripts.deploy-sepolia: yarn thegraph-login && yarn gen-sepolia && yarn build && graph deploy --studio proof-of-humanity-sepolia
scripts.deploy-gnosis: yarn thegraph-login && yarn gen-gnosis && yarn build && graph deploy --studio proof-of-humanity-gnosis
scripts.deploy-chiado-goldsky: yarn gen-chiado-goldsky && yarn build && yarn goldsky-login && goldsky subgraph delete proof-of-humanity-chiado/1.0.0 && goldsky subgraph deploy proof-of-humanity-chiado/1.0.0 --path ./build
scripts.deploy-chiado: yarn thegraph-login && yarn gen-chiado && yarn build && graph deploy --studio proof-of-humanity-chiado
